alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 3:12PM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon today to 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
